content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; script-src-elem chrome-extension://*/popup.js chrome-extension://*/login.js chrome-extension://*/editor-mode.js; child-src https://www.reabr.com/; frame-src https://www.reabr.com/ http://localhost:*; object-src 'none'; connect-src  https://www.reabr.com/ http://localhost:*;
